item.title: Hollandaise Sauce
item.description: Mix egg yolk, water, lemon juice and pinch of salt in the bottom of a blender (or cup for immersion blender) Melt butter until foam subsides Turn on blender/mixer and very slowly pour butter in to mixture Serve on poached eggs and English muffin for Eggs Benedict
